altTitles.en: I Became a Legend After My 10 Year-Long Last Stand

altTitles.ko: 여기는 나한테 맡기고 먼저 가라고 말하고 10년이 지나 전설이 되었다

altTitles.de: Ich kämpfte zehn Jahre zwischen den Dimensionen und kehrte als Legende zurück

altTitles.ja: ここは俺に任せて先に行けと言ってから10年がたったら伝説になっていた。

description.en:
“I guess I thought if I ever made it back here, we could go on adventures, just like we used to. But it's been ten years. We've all changed, in more ways than one. From this moment on, this is the first step in the life of rookie adventurer Lock!”

With no other options, Luck makes the choice to hold the line against the unending demonic hordes alone, to make sure his comrades can escape with their lives. However, through a combination of fortune, skill, and ingenuity, he holds that line for ten straight years, eventually coming out on top single-handedly. Now he has to tackle the dilemma of how to occupy himself in a world where he holds a myriad of roles: that of a legend, that of a veteran, and that of a brand new face.

description.en:
Ranga was an ogre. However, he was also a strong ogre. Strong enough that he became one of the four most elite demons in the whole land. And, as with many other stories, his comrades betray him. Upon his death, he reincarnates as a normal human. Now, with all of the knowledge and strength of his former life, what do you think he’ll do with this new opportunity?

a) Live a peaceful life
b) Live a slow life
c) Do whatever he wants

title.en: I Don't Want to Play Matchmaker!

altTitles.en: I Don't Want to Be a Magpie Bridge
I Don't Want to Be an Ojakgyo
I Don't Want to Be the Magpie Bridge

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

One day, Yui-san, her senior and a health nerd, gave her a massage to relax her body. In return, Yui asked Karin to hug her to warm her body up.

title.en: I Got Reincarnated as a Cat, but Since I’m Bored, I Play VRMMOs With Gamer Girls

altTitles.ja: 猫に転生したけど、暇なのでゲーマー女子と一緒にＶＲＭＭＯをする

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko ni Tenseishita kedo Hima nano de Geema Joshi to Issho ni VRMMO wo suru

description.en:
I am a cat. My name is Nanahoshi. In my previous life, my name was Hokuto Kurokawa. I lost my life in an unexpected accident. I was then reincarnated, not as a human, but as a cat...! Moreover, not in another world, but in the same world just several years in future...! 

But don't worry, because I was taken in by a household that has a full dive VRMMO that even cats can play. The game world basically takes the place of another world! Because of this, I might even be able to use cheats in this world(game world)!?

Alongside my master, the super popular actress "Kanako Nakamura," her popular voice actress friend "MYU," and many pretty NPCs. I should be able to have my fill of adventure inyaa this game world(Isekai.)

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

altTitles.en: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.pl: Nie drocz się ze mną, Nagatoro!

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.pl:
Naoto Hachiouji to nieśmiały chłopak, którego mało co przeraża tak, jak wredne dziewczyny. Nic więc dziwnego, że jego największym szkolnym koszmarem zostaje Nagatoro – koleżanka z niższego roku, która obrała go sobie za cel, regularnie serwując mu atrakcje z pogranicza wojskowej fali i końskich zalotów. Choć wydawać by się mogło, że szkolne życie chłopaka na zawsze pozostanie pasmem nieszczęść, nieoczekiwanie relacja tych dwojga zaczyna zmierzać w niespodziewanym kierunku…

(źródło: Studio JG)
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう
クセ強彼女はとこにいざなう
クセ強彼女は床(とこ)にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusetsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
description.ja:
昔好きだったお姉さんといきなり同棲!?しかもヤリマ●疑惑が浮上!?

一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月（ルナ）の家で同棲することに。
昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。
他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外の
エッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?

ビッチ？なお姉さんたちに囲まれる楽しい新生活、開幕ーー。

description.en: In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.it:
Nel west americano, la gara più grande e importante del mondo sta per iniziare. Migliaia di persone sono pronte a partire da San Diego per viaggiare più di seimila chilometri incoraggiati da un premio enorme da cinquanta milioni di dollari. L'era dei cavalli sta per finire, i partecipanti allora possono usare il veicolo che preferiscono. I partecipanti devono superare situazioni estenuanti, viaggiando centinaia di chilometri al giorno passando per valli deserte inesplorate. La Steel Ball Run è unica nel suo genere.  
  
Giovane Johnny Joestar, un ex corridore di cavalli disabile, è venuto a San Diego per vedere la partenza della gara. Lì incontra Gyro Zeppelli, un corridore con due sfere d'acciaio pendenti fino alla sua vita, al posto della pistola. Johnny vede la sfera di Gyro e capisce della sua potenzialità, riuscendo a far suicidare il nemico durante un duello. Nel mezzo dell'azione, Johnny tocca la sfera d'acciaio di Gyro e sente passare una potenza nelle sue gambe, questa potenza lo fa alzare in piedi per la prima volta dopo due anni. Dopo aver giurato di capire il segreto di quelle sfere, Johnny decide di partecipare alla gara, e qui iniziano le sue bizzarre avventure per tutta l'America nella Steel Ball Run.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

description.en:
Tenth collection of Panpanya's works, one that does not exist yet.

Panpanya's anthology volumes are created at the end of every year around December, but feature the previous year's stories. For example, the 2023 collection of Mokei no Machi features all of 2022's stories. This listing is for panpanya's yet-uncollected stories published in *Rakuen Le Paradis*.

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.en:
Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he's about to rest on his laurels, he's sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash's body!

Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates' lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory. To make up for his previous actions, Ash promises to keep his whole team alive this time while using his wits and knowledge to survive the hellish onslaught of monsters. 

But who brought him to this world in the first place, and why?

Ash may soon find the answers to these questions - if he can survive the bloody battlefield first!
description.fr:
Ash était un streamer de jeux vidéo, surnommé "otaku classique".

Une fois qu'il a réussi à terminer un des jeux classiques les plus compliqués, "Protégez l'Empire", il a été aspiré dans le monde du jeu et s'est réincarné en tant que prince héritier, complètement psychopathe. Dans le jeu d'origine, il était connu comme le pire commandant qui a causé la quasi-destruction des forces armées de la ville, et qui a rencontré une fin tragique.

Cependant, Ash est déterminé à survivre en tant que commandant ''invincible''.
description.ko:
타워디펜스&던전오펜스 RPG <제국을 지켜라>
누구도 클리어하지 못한 난이도로 게임의 엔딩을 봤다.
그런데 정신을 차리니 게임 속이다.
그것도 공략이 불가능한 튜토리얼 스테이지다.
"반드시 클리어해 주마, 이 거지 같은 게임……!"
description.th: <ปกป้องอาณาจักร> เกม RPG แนวป้องกันฐานและตะลุยดันเจี้ยน เกมที่ยากจนไม่มีใครเอาชนะมันได้ แต่ฉันทำได้จนได้เห็นตอนจบ ทว่าพอตั้งสติได้ก็กลับกลายเป็นว่าฉันได้เข้ามาอยู่ในเกมแล้ว แถมยังเป็นด่านปฐมบทที่ไม่มีทางเอาชนะได้อีกต่างหาก “ฉันจะเอาชนะมันให้ได้ ไอ้เกมเสงเครงนี่น่ะ.......!”
description.zh:
重生塔防游戏里的配角，通关地狱级难度的关卡！

无人能通关的地狱级难度塔防游戏“守护帝国”。当首次通关后发现自己居然在游戏里面，还处在不可能成功突破的新手教程剧情里？！

能否再一次成功攻略地狱级难度的游戏？

description.en:
Life's an adventure dammit!

A group of high-school kids goofing around instead of studying, teachers struggling to get a grip on their work and personal lives, a man worrying about his looks, and so on.
This surreal comedy is full of odd, interesting, positively absurd people who live in dizzying harmony, dealing with the nonsense of daily life. Beauty in chaos. Sunshine in disaster.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja: 星剣のソードマスター

altTitles.th: ยอดนักดาบผู้โอบอุ้มดารา

altTitles.es-la: El maestro de la espada cogedor de estrellas

description.en:
The so-called “Lighthouse of the North,” the prosperous trading town of Schoarra, hides a dark underbelly: seedy slums ruled by five ruthless crime bosses.

When streetwise orphan Vlad finds the brothel he works for decimated by a disgraced knight, he turns to the path of the blade, pledging himself to the pursuit of power by sword. 

Blessed with the ability to seek wisdom from his sentient sword, Vlad embarks upon a journey of growth and peril as swordsman in service to the powerful House Vayezid.
description.fr: Vlad est un jeune vagabond du bidonville de Shoara qui admire les chevaliers depuis toujours. Sa vie bascule le jour où une voix commence à résonner dans sa tête après avoir été frappé par un éclair noir, et où le chevalier de la lune bleue apparaît soudainement devant lui.
description.id: Vlad, seorang gelandangan dari daerah kumuh yang ingin menjadi seorang ksatria. Hinggai suatu hari dia tersambar petir hitam... Dan semenjak itu dia dapat mendengar suara seseorang di kepalanya setiap kali ia memegang sesuatu yang berupa pedang!
description.th: 'วลาด' เด็กหนุ่มผู้ยากจนข้นแค้นและไร้อภิสิทธิ์ซึ่งใด ๆ เขามีความชื่นชมในตัวของอัศวินเป็นอย่างมาก และในวันนี้ชีวิตข้างถนนของเขากำลังจะเปลี่ยนไป เมื่อเขาเริ่มได้ยินเสียงของใครบางคนและอัศวินแห่งคณิกาได้ทำลายโลกของเขาจนหมดสิ้น… "แม้จะไม่ใช่ท้องฟ้ายามค่ำคืนและอยู่ไกลเกินกว่าใครจะมองเห็น ขอเพียงแค่มีความตั้งใจที่จะส่องแสง ยังไงก็ต้องได้เป็นดวงดารา"
description.zh:
心怀星梦的流浪汉
逆袭成为剑术大师
梦想成为骑士的贫民窟小流浪汉布拉德，遭遇黑色的晴天霹雳后，便开始能听到某个声音，这个声音和从天而降的神秘骑士彻底颠覆了他的生活…他能如愿走出后巷，成为梦想中的骑士吗？
description.zh-hk: 那把像星星的劍，對生於貧民區的弗拉德而言，曾經十分遙遠。然而僅僅一夜，那道藍月般的劍影就將弗拉德的生活破壞殆盡。 「既然如此，那我便授予你，我的劍技。」弗拉德體內有個聲音對他說。為了復仇，如今少年緊握著手中的星，正式步上成為劍士之路。

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)

description.en:
"Like fire spreading, like sparks touching and blossoming into bright flames. The moment of ignition, like a flash."
The name that appeared on pianist Eden Yeon’s body after he vanished from London a year ago, was that of Tristan Locke, the most beloved nobleman in England.
As his whole body was becoming paralyzed, Eden searched for months and was able to finally find Tristan deep in a Scotland forest. However, surprisingly, Tristan's body did not bear his name.
Without Tristan Locke, Eden cannot survive. But being a straight man, Tristan coldly rejects any contact with Eden. Desperately trying to reclaim his lost life, Eden has no choice but to cling to the man who doesn't need him.
※ What is a 'Name'?
→ A rare condition in which the name of one's destined partner is engraved on the body, appearing in a very small number of people worldwide. It is accompanied by painful symptoms that can only be alleviated through constant contact with the partner.
※ The titles and speech styles in this work have been adapted to be suitable for the Korean language.

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao Ashi

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.ja-ro: Feari Teiru: Hyaku-nen Kuesuto

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

title.en: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed

altTitles.en: The Melancholy of the Wicked Duke's Lady
The Melancholy of the Evil Duke's Young Lady

description.en: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sends her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and turned him into a dog during the day and could only turn back to a human at night. What’s worse, she even named it “Tofu” after she found it wandering in the Imperial Palace. Who would have known it was her own husband!

altTitles.ja: ラブ・らっきぃ

description.en: Fuuta is an average-looking salaryman who's never had luck with women. However, all that changes when he meets a strange girl through a dating agency. She's nice, but has an odd habit of always wearing masks on their dates. One day, Fuuta sees his mask-wearing girlfriend being attacked by (what he thinks are) thieves. Fuuta saves her from them, and full of happiness and gratitude, the girl confesses and proposes to him. The night they get married, she finally takes off her mask and reveals her identity: She's the super-idol singer Kirari who Fuuta admires! Thus starts their life as a married couple.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

altTitles.ja-ro: Mokushiroku no Yonkishi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.pt-br: Quero judiar da minha linda chefinha

altTitles.es: Quiero molestar a mi linda jefa

altTitles.ja: 可愛い上司を困らせたい

altTitles.en: I want to Annoy the Pretty Boss

altTitles.ja-ro: Kawaii Joushi wo Komarasetai

description.en: Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning, she wakes up and finds the new employee, Aoki Shun, sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!
description.ja:
敏腕女性上司+新人男子=恋人!?

井羅恵は31歳の食品会社次長。
仕事に全てを捧げ、恋愛や結婚は二の次に。
そんな彼女の前に、要領が良い新人男子・青木が現れる。
彼の言動にいらつく恵だが、飲み会で酔った挙句、
青木と一夜を共にして…。

ドキドキが止まらないラブコメ4コマ!!
description.pt-br: Ira Megumi é uma mulher que desistiu de ter uma família ou de agir como uma simples mulher e se dedicou arduamente em seu trabalho, assim chegando ao cargo de vice-diretora em uma grande empresa. Aoki Shun um novato na empresa, amigável, porém desleixado e não parece levar o novo trabalho a sério. Mas algo acontece na festa de boas vindas dos novatos na empresa e Ira acorda ao lado de Aoki na cama… O que diabos aconteceu? Será possível um relacionamento amoroso entre duas pessoas tão diferentes?

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres

description.es-la: La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

description.en:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño pequeño apareció ante mí. “¿Sabes dónde está la academia? ¡Tengo que ir ahí! “ “Has estado yendo en la dirección equivocada todo este tiempo. “ ” !!! “ “¿Qué está mirando, señor?” Supongo que esta es mi hija. "¿Quieres uno?" Pero no creo que ella sepa que soy su padre... Probablemente estés pensando eso, ¿verdad? ¡Si crees eso, estás equivocado, papá! Mi nombre es Calypso, un regresor cuatro veces. Mi vida se arruinó cuando poseí un personaje de novela. ¡Incluso tuve un hijo! ¡El tercer episodio de mi vida fue un final de masacre! '¡Ustedes XX chicos que están locos por esta protagonista femenina!' Sin embargo, por alguna razón, no importa lo que haga, no puedo pasar de mi cumpleaños número 22 y regresar a mi mundo. 
Sin embargo, accidentalmente encontré una manera en la tercera partida cuando el dragón se salió de control y murió. Cuando el dragón corre desenfrenado, ¡la dimensión se distorsiona! ¿Puedo volver a la casa en la que viví durante eso? La cuarta vez, cuando regresé nuevamente, decidí usar este dragón. ¿Abby? ¿Hermanos mayores? ¡Todo es solo un trampolín para encontrarte con el dragón! "¡Espera, dragón!" [Quiero morir ahora, pero me estoy volviendo loco con todos estos retornos repetidos.] [Mi familia está ligada a la familia real] [¿Alguien ha oído hablar alguna vez de los débiles?/ Sólo los más fuertes son felices]

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

description.en: The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...

description.en: Kana Takachiho, despite her disadvantages, is a pretty nice girl. She’s friendly, outgoing, and used to be good at sports until she was injured in a freak accident, losing the scholarship keeping her in school, and earning her the disdain of her fellow classmates. Oh, and her childhood friend and (self-proclaimed) boyfriend, Aki, just so happens to be a vampire who turned her into his slave after drinking her blood on their first date. But Aki’s not just any vampire; he’s a Pureblood, and he’s participating in a game to find the seven “Stigmas” in order to wake his twin brother and Kana’s other childhood friend, Eriya, from his mysterious slumber…

altTitles.ja: ギヴン

description.en: Ritsuka Uenoyama is bored with it all—with school, with his basketball club, and even with his one true passion: playing guitar. That is, until the day he finds his favorite hidden napping spot occupied by a strange boy cradling a broken-stringed guitar. At first, Uenoyama is nonplussed by Mafuyu Sato and his slightly odd behavior, but when, on a whim, he asks Mafuyu to sing, the power of that song pierces him to the core.
description.pt-br: Está preso profundamente dentro de mim, não posso tirá-la da minha cabeça. A voz do Mafuyu é uma arma perigosa. Neste dia comecei a perceber que tocar guitarra e jogar basquete, duas atividades que gosto muito, começaram a se tornar chatas...

description.en:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last...

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202311futago)
description.ja:
品行方正、成績トップの同級生美少女・宇佐見。
校内で俺をライバル視して突っかかる彼女には放課後、別の顔がある。
彼女は放課後、ゲーセンで遊び、学校では想像できない無邪気な笑顔を見せるのだ。

俺は宇佐見と仲良くなるため、校内では寄り添い、放課後は一緒に遊ぶ。
それぞれの場所で仲を深め、ついに……ハートフル三角ラブコメ開幕！
description.es-la: Usami, una hermosa compañera de clase, modelo de buena conducta y la mejor en calificaciones, me ve como su rival en la escuela. Sin embargo, después de clases, ella muestra una faceta completamente diferente. Después de la escuela, juega en la sala de juegos y muestra una inocente sonrisa que no podrías imaginar viendo en la escuela. Para acercarme a Usami, la acompañó en la escuela y jugamos juntos después de clases. En cada lugar, nuestra amistad se profundiza, ¡y finalmente se abre el telón de una conmovedora comedia romántica de triángulo amoroso!
description.pt-br:
Usami é uma linda colega de classe, com bons costumes e notas altas. Na escola, ela vê Sakuto como seu rival. Mas quando ele a encontra depois da escola, ele vê um lado diferente dela. Ela estava jogando no fliperama depois das aulas e tinha aquele sorriso inocente que ninguém poderia imaginar nela na escola.

Para se dar bem com ela, ele se aproxima dela na escola e depois joga com ela depois da escola. Cada um deles tem seus lugares onde podem aprofundar seus laços e, finalmente...

Este é o início de uma comédia romântica de triângulo amoroso comovente!

A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! description.en: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
description.it:
Napoli, 2001. Giorno Giovana è un piccolo criminale con il grande sogno di diventare una "Gang-Star". Giorno ha una connessione con la linea sanguigna Joestar, e possiede lo stand "Gold Experience". Il suo sogno inizia a diventare realtà quando incontra Bruno Bucciarati, un partecipante della gang "Passione" e un portatore di stand. Giunti alla conclusione che tutti e due hanno idee simili, e che unanimamente non concordano sugli affari della gang, Giorno rivela il suo obiettivo: con l'aiuto di Bruno, riformerà Passione spodestando il capo della gang.

Giorno, una volta diventato membro di Passione ed entrato nella squadra di Bucciarati, scopre che non è una semplice gang, è piena di portatori di stand. Una volta confrontatesi con le altre squadre, sleali e imprevedibili, scoprono che il loro obiettivo di cambiare la gang dall'interno non sarà facile da raggiungere. Parlando a proposito di questi avversari, Gioeno tenta di ralire tra i ranghi per avvicinarsi al boss, un uomo circondato dal mistero.

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…

Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.en: Tatsuhiro moved to Tokyo to attend an art school and start his new life. In his new room, there’s a small hole in the wall. At first he can see nothing through the small hole, but one night, through the peeping hole, he saw a girl. That’s how his new life starts.

description.en:
Yuri, a modern day teenager who had just received her first kiss, is suddenly whisked away 
to ancient Anatolia, where an evil queen needs her for a blood sacrifice. 
Thankfully the timely intervention of Prince Kail saves Yuri from the queen's grasp. For now. 
Kail promises to send Yuri back to her home, but the queen's persistent schemes to kill them both, 
plus their growing interest in each other, keep those plans delayed.  

  **Winner of 2001 Shogakukan Manga Award for Shōjo** 

Note: Final 28th volume contains a side story called Orontes Renka, set in the same historical period.  
 
The Hittite empire is about to become an Egyptian territory through marriage between the Hittite princess and the Egyptian king. 
A traveler from Egypt, Maripas, visits Anatolia at that time but gets robbed of all his belongings while playing good samaritan. 
He's thankfully offered shelter by an unusually well-educated Hittite woman named Yuri. 
But this seemingly innocent meeting soon turns into a thrilling romantic adventure – 
cases of mistaken identity and runaway royals are about to complicate international relations!

altTitles.ja: 織田信長という謎の職業が魔法剣士よりチートだったので、王国を作ることにしました

altTitles.zh-hk: 因為織田信長這個謎之職業比魔法劍士還要作弊、所以決定了要創立王國

description.en:
The young Alsrod (Arusuroddo), is eagerly waiting for the day that he’s granted a “job” in the temple. In this world when one reaches adulthood, they are granted “jobs” like swordsman or magician by divine revelation, among them the one said to be the strongest is magic swordsman.

Alsrod is the illegitimate second son of a small feudal lord, and the seat is already succeded by his elder brother who already put him in the front lines, he’s in a position that could lose his life on the battlefield any day. If he became a magic swordman, a job that was possesed by the famous heroes of the past, he could change his situation.

However the job that’s granted to Alsrod is not magic swordman nor any of the other common jobs, it was a mysterious job called “Oda Nobunaga” that none of the temple’s people knew anything about.

However, this job makes one’s battle power become the top-level in the battlefield, gives administration capabilities that allow to turn a small city into a big commercial city and it also elevates the leadership of the troops, becoming a Maou capable of building a country!

Before long, Alsrod defeats his elder brother and becomes the feudal lord. Furthermore, he prepares himself to become a king and build his own country, considering it to be the shortest route to protect the important persons in his life and his people.
description.ru: Молодой Арсрод со страстью ждет день, когда получит "долг" в храме. В этом мире, когда кто-то достигает совершеннолетия, он обретает "долг" в храме, как мечник или маг, путем божественного откровения. Среди них сильнейшим считается маг - мечник.Арсрод незаконнорожденый второй сын малого феодального рода, и его трон уже занят его старшим братом, который уже послал его на передовую, где он в положении, в котором может лишиться жизни в битве в любое мгновение. Если он станет магом-мечником, званием, которым обладали знаменитые герои прошлого, то он сможет изменить свою ситуацию.Однако долг, данная Арсроду не маг-мечник и не какая-нибудь из других известных, а странный долг под названием "Ода Нобунага", про которую никто в храме ничего не знает, Этот долг дает огромную мощь в бою, управленческие способности, которые позволяют превратить маленький городок в огромный торговый город и улучшает лидерские качества, что ты становишься Сатаной, способным создать страну!Вскоре, Арсрод свергает своего старшего брата и сам становится лордом. Далее, он готовит себя к становлению королем и созданию своей страны, считая, что кратчайший путь - защитить важнейших людей в свой жизни и свой народ.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity IV: The Forbidden Advent Garden, Salem - Heretical Salem

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅳ 禁忌降臨庭園 セイレム 異端なるセイレム

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten IV: Kinki Kourin Teien, Salem - Itan naru Salem

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность IV: Запретный сад Адвента, Салем-Салем Ереси

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng IV - Khu Vườn Giáng Lâm Cấm Kỵ Salem - Salem Dị Giáo

description.en: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
description.ru: Халдея во главе с Рицука Фуджимару, мастером, проникшим на проклятую землю «Салем», чтобы ответить на новую «особенность». "Я встретила двух девушек Эбигейл и Лавинию".

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

altTitles.ja: 相席いいですか？

altTitles.en: Is It Okay If We Share a Table?

description.en:
Tsubaki is a working woman struggling with the relationships between her subordinates. Momoko is a university student struggling with her part-time job. Two people of different ages and backgrounds happen to sit together...? 

It's a breath of fresh air, a relaxing lunchtime comedy.

altTitles.ja: どうも、腐女子です。

description.en: Sayuri, Miyuki, and Tsubomi, a trio of fujoshi, are thrilled to be in a paradise where 33 out of 36 students in their class are boys. This fujoshi comedy follows these high school girls, who are completely immersed in their fantasies, showing no interest in real love and instantly categorizing everyone they see as either "uke" or "seme," along with their classmates who give off a BL vibe.
